name: Three Nights at Buff Helpy's: Joke Game
name_original: Three Nights at Buff Helpy's: Joke Game
description:
Note: This game belongs to Kroshx


You're Dawko, one day, after shaving your hair for charity, you went to bed but little did you know that your hair wants revenge on you for abandoning him(your hair hates charity for some reason, time to cancel him on Twitter) and decides to do the best thing the hair of a FNaF youtuber can do: trap Dawko in his dreams and force him into meme hell. It's your job to survive 3 "nights" trapped in your sleep against Buff Helpy, Breadbear, Shadow Balloon Boy, the Puppet and even yourself. Good luck pal, we gave you a gun too so this might be a little easier IDK


@kroshx - Creator, Ideas, Animator, Renderer, Yeah
